duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for every aspect of the store operation, including selecting, coaching, and developing store teammates, as well as merchandising, advertising, and promotion of products and services.
Manages overall store operations, oversees customer satisfaction, resolves complaints, and develops customer retention strategies.
Manages financial aspects of the business, including evaluating and taking corrective actions, and protecting store and company assets.
Leads the recruitment, coaching, and development of store teammate staff, manages scheduling and staffing, and establishes teammate performance standards.
Greets and handles customers, opens and/or closes the store as required, and attends all area and special meetings as required.
Grows profit through service or tire recommendations, coaches, motivates, and leads store teammates, and develops and manages teammate retention programs.
Handles customer complaints, tire adjustments, and develops customer loyalty and retention through relationship selling.
Assists with physical duties such as unloading merchandise shipments, changing and balancing tires, and constructing store displays.

Performs management activities such as daily management of the retail automotive service store, coaching, leading, and motivating teammates, and making calls to outside suppliers for parts and equipment.
Performs store upkeep activities, including setting up and taking down outside tire rack, stacking tires, maintaining store displays, and using cleaning supplies to keep the store clean.
Coordinates store deliveries, including receiving tire deliveries, storing tires, and handling store deliveries of merchandise.
Performs various tasks related to the store floor, including opening and closing doors, performing computer work, and pulling tires for customers.
Manages the work environment by implementing and maintaining safety and health environmental policies and coaching, leading, and motivating teammates.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
Completed all current and required BSRO store education courses & modules required for this position
